name: Just A Sim sim (ＲＥＢＯＯＴ)
description:
What is the Game about?🤔
🏃🏻The Game is a Mix of Goat simulator and Traditional Platformers!🏃🏻
i'm planning on adding MMO/RPG Mechanic's to the Game,🧙🏻‍♂️

What's Next?🎁
Alot of thing's!
here's a List of Future Goals!
🔽Roadmap🔽
Future Features 🎀
- (Confirmed) Dialogue With NPC's 💭
- (Confirmed) Quest System 🧙‍♂️
- (Confirmed) Enemy's For MMO/RPG Gameplay 🧟
- (Confirmed) Multiplayer👫🏻
- (Confirmed) Multiple Languages🥰
- (Confirmed) Interactive tutorial's🥸
- (Maybe) Enemy Bosses🤴
- (Maybe) Vehicles 🛻
- (Maybe) Enemy Bases 🏴‍☠️
- (Unlikely) Follower/Helper NPC's🫂

More Coming Soon (;
